What is the relationship between an ID and a currency in Verus?

In Verus, an ID with a specific name is required to create a currency with the same name. The controller of this ID has the exclusive ability to create a currency with that name, and they can only do so once.

What is the significance of controlling an ID in Verus, specifically in relation to creating currencies?

Controlling an ID in Verus gives the owner the exclusive ability to create a currency with the same name. This means that only the controller of the ID can create a currency with that specific name, and they can only do so once. This adds a layer of security and control to the creation of currencies in Verus.
